sen.j: 『茶経』（ちゃきょう 茶經）は、8世紀頃中国・唐の、陸羽によって著された書物である。
sen.e: "Chakyo" (The Classic of Tea) is the book written by Lu Yu around eighth century in China under the Tang dynasty.

sen.e: Chakyo is the oldest book on tea, and it is deemed to have been written around 760.
